documents.question: Website and partnership
documents.answer: I spoke with Paulmichael on partnering with him on his I need remedy now course by adding him and his team to my website. I offer credit repair and have a link on my website to bring potential clients to his platform. According to Paulmichael, as long as his price for his services is covered, I will be offering a alternative price to cover the difference. I want to make sure that before my website is launched that it's set up properly and all the loose ends are covered.

documents.question: Double Charged
documents.answer: I was charged $69 on January the 30th and $69 on January the 31st. I had requested that these payments come out of my account on the second of each month and they just keep getting earlier and earlier. Until one of these $69 is credited back to me I cannot make my rent payment which is due by the 5th. I always make my rent payment on the 1st. My rent was the only thing that I left in this account. This information was transmitted in a response email on 2/1. Immediate attention would be greatly appreciated.
documents.category: Could you let me know how to make payment to keep the account activate"

documents.question: modules
documents.answer: Good morning, I'm so confused!! I joined last week, I've spent at least 5 hours online and can not find a class to start learning. What's a girl to do? I thought the $69.00/month gives me access to a class at least. This is very frustrating for me. I have 3 hours 5 days a week to study and need to make the most of this time. PLEASE HELP! THANK YOU!!! -Laura I think I could use a phone call, communicating via text bubbles is so difficult... (630) 632-8840 I'm on the east coast and I'm up at 5am M-F, study hours 6am-9am. THANK YOU!! GOD BLESS YOU!!
documents.category: 2026-01-16 17:28:48 - Allen Shamzi: now your problem is resolve"

documents.question: modules
documents.answer: Good morning, I'm so confused!! I joined last week, I've spent at least 5 hours online and can not find a class to start learning. What's a girl to do? I thought the $69.00/month gives me access to a class at least. This is very frustrating for me. I have 3 hours 5 days a week to study and need to make the most of this time. PLEASE HELP! THANK YOU!!! -Laura I think I could use a phone call, communicating via text bubbles is so difficult... (630) 632-8840 I'm on the east coast and I'm up at 5am M-F, study hours 6am-9am. THANK YOU!! GOD BLESS YOU!!
documents.category: "2026-01-12 20:41:04 - Allen Shamzi: Good morning Laura, Thank you so much for reaching out, and I'm really sorry for the confusion and frustration you've experienced. I completely understand how discouraging it can feel when you're motivated to learn but can't easily find where to begin. Your $69/month subscription does give you full access to the available classes and learning material. I'd be more than happy to personally guide you on where to start and help you choose the right class based on your goals and available study time. We can absolutely arrange a phone call or a live Google Meet to walk you through everything step by step, whichever you find more comfortable. Since you're on the East Coast and available between 6:00 AM – 9:00 AM (ET), please let me know which day and time works best for you, and I'll schedule it accordingly. You're not alone in this—we're here to support you and make sure you get the most out of your study time. Looking forward to helping you get started smoothly. Warm regards, Allen Tech Team Creditor Academy

documents.question: Cant login at certain time of day
documents.answer: Pretty much everyday from around 6pm PST to around 7 or 8pm PST when I try to login to the LMS it just say Internal Server Error. But works fine after that.
documents.category: "2026-01-06 20:28:53 - mark millers: Hi Giovanni, Thank you for reporting this and for sharing the specific time window when the issue occurs. We've identified that this is related to a temporary server-side issue during peak usage hours, which can cause intermittent login errors such as the "Internal Server Error" you experienced. Our technical team is actively investigating and working on optimizations to prevent this from happening. We appreciate your patience while we work to resolve this and will keep you updated as progress is made. Please feel free to reach out if you notice any changes or have additional questions. Best regards, Mark Creditor Academy Support

documents.question: My Courses not showing all modules/lessons
documents.answer: Hello. My account is missingcontent: modules/lessons/documents in each course. Please investigate/correct.
documents.category: 2025-12-23 17:27:30 - Ashutosh Kandpal: Thank you for reporting the issue. The missing course content (modules, lessons, and documents) may be due to one of the following reasons: ->The content has not yet been published or added to the course. ->There may be a temporary system or sync issue affecting content visibility. ->Your account permissions or enrollment may need to be refreshed. Our team is reviewing this from the backend to confirm the exact cause. In the meantime, you may try the following: ->Log out and log back into your account. ->Clear your browser cache or try accessing the platform using a different browser. ->Ensure you are enrolled in the correct course. We will update this ticket once the investigation is complete or if any action is required from your end. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

documents.question: FAO: Aleena & P-Michael - Progress is wiped and I only see the basic modules again!
documents.answer: Hi Aleena, I've really struggled with the website and support despite having a subscription. Previously you kindly unlocked extra education for me, but I never received the promised MasterClass recordings. Now, after logging back in, all my progress is wiped and I only see the basic modules again. I also couldn't access the recent live Zoom after 30 mins trying. I'd really appreciate if you could raise this directly with Paul-Michael. Thank you, Gavin. (Emailed to Aleena directly).

The missing course content (modules, lessons, and documents) may be due to one of the following reasons: ->The content has not yet been published or added to the course. ->There may be a temporary system or sync issue affecting content visibility. ->Your account permissions or enrollment may need to be refreshed. documents.question: Joining class
documents.answer: When pressing the Join Now button when trying to join the class it doesn't work it just says "Failed to mark attendance". I have to copy paste the link to join
documents.category: 2025-11-21 04:36:07 - Ashutosh Kandpal: It's showing "Failed To Mark Attendance" because you maybe already clicked the join now button so it's marking attendance and when you click it again it won't mark it again that's why it's showing this message. We are working on this issue and will be solved shortly. Thank you for your patience.

documents.question: Three problems with Athena involving class connecting issues.
documents.answer: 1) Logging into a class is delayed for a couple of minutes before the acceptance window appears to complete the login. 2) I keep getting "Event Attendance Alert" This email toggles a phishing claim by Outlook 3) the email was from arya@creditoracademy.com Thanks Jack G
documents.category: 2025-11-21 04:41:07 - Ashutosh Kandpal: You are getting the alert because you might be not joining the event . And it maybe showed "Failed to mark attendance" to you because once you clicked the join now button then attendance is already marked. We are working on resolving the issues. Thank you for your cooperation.

documents.question: Cancel my Membership.
documents.answer: Hello. With all due respect this is not what I expected. Paul said in a youtube video that you will get a step by step tutorials without paying anything extra to access courses. Now when I joined the membership I see the courses are paid and have to buy extra credits on top of the monthly subscription plan to access courses. I can't buy extra credits to access courses. This is not what I expected. Kindly cancel my membership and refund me my amount.
documents.category: 2025-11-21 04:41:07 - Ashutosh Kandpal: You are getting the alert because you might be not joining the event . And it maybe showed "Failed to mark attendance" to you because once you clicked the join now button then attendance is already marked. We are working on resolving the issues.
